Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Shark Tank Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the large room with a giant shark tank in the center of it.
Room.LongDescription: Sharks are perhaps one of the most deadly creatures of the sea. Although they usually travel alone, they will often converge on a single prey when they smell blood. The management suggests that you do not enter the large tank, but watch the sharks from the outside.
